collaborations.title: The Wall (Aryaki Feat. Kris Janowski) (2025)
collaborations.description: Upcoming Nu Metal track written in collaboration with Aryaki
An energetic electronic anthem blending melodic hooks, driving beats, and Dominika Jonczyk’s captivating vocals.
collaborations.title: Leo (Feat. Dominika Jonczyk) (2024)
collaborations.details:
##### Overview

**Leo** delivers an uplifting blend of soaring melodies, dynamic electronic beats, and captivating vocals by Dominika Jonczyk. The track draws the listener into an energetic, dance-ready soundscape with emotional depth.

##### Sound & Mood

* Ambient synth textures and pulsing bass
* Rapid spoken-word verses contrasting melodic choruses
* Layered harmonies and propulsive percussion

Jonczyk’s vocal presence creates a perfect balance of power and vulnerability, turning the track into both a personal statement and a communal anthem.

##### Themes

*Leo* celebrates personal strength, resilience, and emotional release — a powerful fusion of movement and meaning.

collaborations.title: Libra (Feat. Aryaki) (2024)
collaborations.description: A progressive electronic track blending dance beats and Aryaki’s ethereal vocals.
collaborations.details:
##### Overview

*Libra* captures the essence of balance, beauty, and harmony through a blend of progressive electronic elements and atmospheric vocals.

##### Sound & Mood

* Ambient electronic textures layered with progressive dance beats
* Aryaki’s ethereal vocal style adds airiness and emotion
* Melodic progressions that flow gracefully

##### Themes

The track explores Libra’s ideals of symmetry and beauty, translating them into a sonic form that evolves seamlessly, always seeking equilibrium.

collaborations.title: Scorpio (Feat. Kateryna) (2025)
collaborations.description: Dark electronic track with haunting vocals exploring the essence of Scorpio.
collaborations.details:
##### Overview

*Scorpio* reflects the intense and enigmatic nature of the zodiac sign through a fusion of dark electronica and evocative vocal performance by Kateryna.

##### Sound & Mood

* Deep, punchy beats
* Dubstep-inspired synth motifs
* Haunting piano runs
* Kateryna’s vocals in both Ukrainian and English add depth and mystique

##### Themes

The track channels Scorpio’s characteristics — mystery, power, and emotional complexity. Its brooding textures and shifting dynamics create a journey into the darker facets of the zodiac psyche.

collaborations.title: Bird Of Paradise (Feat. Ashe O'Hara & Ania Diamond) (2022)
collaborations.description: A progressive alternative anthem with heartfelt lyrics and rich instrumental layers.
collaborations.details:
##### Overview

*Bird Of Paradise* stands as the artist’s defining work, blending intricate musicality with deep personal meaning.

##### Sound & Mood

* Graceful, layered vocals from Ashe O’Hara and Ania Diamond
* Progressive guitar and bass arrangements
* Rich, evolving textures

##### Themes

Written in memoriam, the song addresses themes of love, loss, resilience, and the transcendent power of music as a vessel for grief and healing.

collaborations.title: Euphoria (solo version) Feat. Tom Fahey
collaborations.description: An intimate guitar duet revisiting 'Euphoria' with guest soloist Tom Fahey, recorded in one take.

collaborations.title: Doublethink (2014)
collaborations.description: Short demo collaboration from 2014 with Dave Bryce.
